8  int Circular::runAlgorithm(const cv::Mat &input_image, const sensor_msgs::Imu &imu, nav_msgs::Odometry &odom_estimated, cv::Mat &output_image, std::string &image_encoding){

125  void Circular::initializeParameters(ros::NodeHandle &node){
126  Descriptor base, range;
127  // Loading parameters from a launch file
128  node.param("threshold", this->threshold_, 100);
129  node.param("min_score", this->blob_.min_score, 7);
130  node.getParam("landmark_diag", this->landmark_diag_);
131 
132  // Base descriptor parameters
133  node.getParam("base_shape", base.invariant.shape);
134  node.getParam("base_area", base.invariant.area);
135  node.getParam("base_hu", base.invariant.hu);
136 
137  // (Similarity) range descriptor parameters
138  node.getParam("range_shape", range.invariant.shape);
139  node.getParam("range_area", range.invariant.area);
140  node.getParam("range_hu", range.invariant.hu);
141 
142  this->blob_.setBase(base);
143  this->blob_.setRange(range);
144  }

149  void Circular::resetParameters(void){
150  // Reset region of interest
151  roi_.x_offset = 0;
152  roi_.y_offset = 0;
153  roi_.width = this->width_;
154  roi_.height = this->height_;
155 
156  }

163  void Circular::preProcessing(const cv::Mat &input_image, cv::Mat &output_image){
164  // Copy only region of interest
165  output_image = cv::Mat(input_image, cv::Range(this->roi_.y_offset, this->roi_.y_offset+this->roi_.height-1), cv::Range(this->roi_.x_offset, this->roi_.x_offset+this->roi_.width-1) ).clone();
166  /****************************** COLORFUL TARGET *********************************/
167  // Colorspace transform
168  //std::vector<cv::Mat> rgb;
169  //cv::split(output_image, rgb);
170  //output_image = 5*(rgb[1]-rgb[0]) + (rgb[1]-rgb[2]);
171  /***************************** BLACK AND WHITE *********************************/
172  // Colorspace transform
173  cv::cvtColor(output_image, output_image, CV_RGB2GRAY);
174  // Low pass filter
175  // cv::GaussianBlur( output_image, output_image, cv::Size( 3, 3 ), 0, 0);
176  // Gray to black and wgite
177  // cv::threshold(output_image, output_image, this->threshold_, 255, cv::THRESH_BINARY_INV);
178 
179 
180  int r = output_image.rows;
181  int c = output_image.cols;
182 
183  int n = this->roi_.width/250 + 2;//std::ceil(2.0*this->roi_.width)/(this->width_) + 2;
184  std::cout << "n: " << n << std::endl;
185  int qr = r/n;
186  int qc = c/n;
187  for (int w = 0; w<n; w++){
188  for (int k = 0; k< n; k++){
189  int sum =0 ;
190  for (int i=w*qr; i<(w+1)*qr; ++i){
191  for (int j=k*qc; j<(k+1)*qc; ++j){
192  sum += output_image.at<uchar>(i,j);
193  }
194  }
195 
196  int average = sum/(qr*qc) - 20;
197  // std::cout << "val " << w << ": " << average << std::endl;
198 
199  for (int i=w*qr; i<(w+1)*qr; ++i){
200  for (int j=k*qc; j<(k+1)*qc; ++j){
201  if (output_image.at<uchar>(i,j) > average ){
202  output_image.at<uchar>(i,j) = 0;
203  } else{
204  output_image.at<uchar>(i,j) = 255;
205  }
206  }
207  }
208  }
209  }
210 
211 
212  }

218  bool Circular::segmentation(const cv::Mat &input_image){
219 
220  std::vector<std::vector<cv::Point> > contours;
221  std::vector<cv::Vec4i> hierarchy;
222  cv::Mat mat = input_image.clone();
223 
224  // Contours
225  cv::findContours( mat, contours, hierarchy, CV_RETR_EXTERNAL, CV_CHAIN_APPROX_NONE, cv::Point(this->roi_.x_offset, this->roi_.y_offset) );
226  // Landmark detection
227  int result = this->blob_.detect(contours, this->descriptor);
228 
229  // If result is geq to zero, then a landmark has been detected
230  if (result >= 0){
231  this->contours_ = contours[result];
232  return true;
233  }else
234  return false;
235 
236  }

244 int main(int argc, char **argv){

246  ros::init(argc,argv,"");
247 
248  // Visual odometry algorithm
249  landmark::Circular algorithm;
250 
251  // Monocular VO Node
252  visoOdom::MonocularNode node(algorithm);
253
